Description: Foot from a colossal acrolithic marble statue, possibly of the Egyptian god Serapis.
Curator's comments: Dorothy Kent Hill, D. K. 1946. Material on the Cult of Sarapis. Hesperia 15.1:60-72. Dow, S. and Upson, F. S 1944.’The foot of Sarapis’. Hesperia 13.1: 58-77. Guarducci, M. 1974: Epigrafia Graeca III. Rome, 73-74. Petridou, G. 2009. Artemidi to ichnos: divine feet and hereditary priesthood in Pisidian Pogla . Anatolian Studies 59: 81-93.
